cn remember

Shows all remembered values.

cn remember ACCOUNT|ACTOR|STORE|KEYPAIR as TEXT
cn remember ACTOR on STORE as TEXT

Remembers the indicated actor hash, account, store, or key pair as TEXT. This information is stored in the global state, and therefore persists until the name is deleted (cn forget …) or redefined (cn remember …).

Key pairs are stored as link (absolute path) to the key pair file, and specific to the device.

cn forget LABEL

Forgets the corresponding item.

Syntax

Open
